about_the_game:
An exciting intellectual fishing game for one or more players, where as a “fish” you need to catch words divided into two parts. Each player gets control of a boat and a fishing rod, with which they need to catch as many fish as possible. Each fish carries only one of the two parts of a word. For example, the word “game” will be divided into two fish “ig” and “ra”. Whoever catches both of these syllables will collect the word “game”. Whichever player caught the most words in a certain time won!

About the game
Simple rules: each player can either move left and right (to determine where to cast the fishing rod), or lower and raise the fishing rod. To catch a fish, you just need to “hook” it with a hook. To catch a word, you need to catch two fish - parts of this word.
There is a mode for 1 player (catch as many word fish as possible against time and earn more coins).
There is a mode for several (2-4) players on one screen (have time to catch more fish than your friends).
Support for Russian and English languages (both in the interface and in gameplay).
There are 2 difficulty levels for each language (the difficulty level affects the number and complexity of words; even preschoolers know words at an easy level)
There are 9 fisherman characters to choose from.
At the end of each round, each player receives a prize - coins (as many coins as he managed to catch the words).
There is a store where you can spend the coins you earn and buy cool nautical jewelry.
Timed game.
The game uses cute cartoon graphics.
The game has beautiful special effects and pleasant music!

name: Word on the hook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 2.66 GHz or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x64-compatible, 4-core, 3.2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: An exciting intellectual fishing game, where you need to catch words (as a “fish”) and earn coins!
